EmailTemplate.description: Used to remind users to submit Annual Survey 1 day before deadline
EmailTemplate.name: Currency Center Annual Survey Notification Last
EmailTemplate.subject: Annual Survey reminder - last day
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Currency Center users,
This serves as a reminder to complete your Annual Survey on the Remittance of Foreign Balance for the year {YEAR(TODAY())-1}. Please ensure you provide us with complete information by tomorrow, t 15th March {YEAR(TODAY())}. Please note only airlines who responded to the RFB Survey will have access to the RFB Report showing the overall industry picture.
Should you have any queries, please log a case in your IATA Customer portal under the topic "Currency Center".
Kind regards, Currency Center Team
